mapper.delete: delete from salarysystem.salary where username = #{username} and month = #{month}
mapper.update: update salarysystem.salary set postwage = #{salary.postWage}, meritpay = #{salary.meritPay}, senioritypay = #{salary.seniorityPay}, subsidy = #{salary.subsidy}, paid = #{salary.paid} where username = #{username} and month = #{salary.month}
